name: app-tag-manager
title: App Tag Manager
description: Organize and search macOS applications with tags
author: zaincheung

commands.name: export-tags
commands.title: App Tags Export
commands.subtitle: Copy all tag configurations to clipboard
commands.description: Export all app tag configurations to clipboard as JSON

commands.name: import-tags
commands.title: App Tags Import
commands.subtitle: Import tag configurations from clipboard
commands.description: Import and apply tag configurations from clipboard JSON

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
